item.title: Corey add a quote by Rainer Werner Fassbinder
item.description: "I detest the idea that love between two persons can lead to salvation. All my life I have fought against this oppressive type of relationship. Instead, I believe in searching for a kind of love that somehow involves all of humanity." -- Rainer Werner Fassbinder

item.title: Corey add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "I bear my burden proudly for all to see, to conquer prejudice and ignorance and hate with knowledge and sincerity and love. Whenever you are threatened by a hostile presence, you emit a thick cloud of love like an octopus squirts out ink..." -- William S. Burroughs
